bibl.title: Taking Care of the Weak. An Arabic Papyrus from the Tropenmuseum, Amsterdam.
bibl.note: Provenance unknown, H. III / AD IX. - Two texts or one? - Care for the poor in medieval Egypt.

bibl.title: Inediti offerti a Rosario Pintaudi per il suo 65° compleanno.

bibl.seg: 141.8 P. Amst. Tropenmus. Inv. 3134-58 = P. Pintaudi 70
Sijpesteijn Petra M., Taking Care of the Weak. An Arabic Papyrus from the Tropenmuseum, Amsterdam.
Diletta Minutoli (a cura di), Inediti offerti a Rosario Pintaudi per il suo 65° compleanno (P.Pintaudi) (Firenze, 2012) pp. 289-294 et pll. LXIX-LXX.
Provenance unknown, H. III / AD IX. - Two texts or one? - Care for the poor in medieval Egypt.
